DESCRIPTION: Kattaikonam is one of trivandrum's most sought after destination for residential houses and this 4 bhk house in kattaikonam is your opportunity to be a part of this community. This house occupies a built up area of 2500 sq.Ft. And contains 4 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms and 2 balconies. The houses comes with dedicated 1 covered and 2 open parking space(s) where you can easily park your vehicle(s). This villa is currently under construction stage and you can expect the possession of the same within 3 months. It is a freehold property. The price of this spacious independent house is  98 lac. Borewell/tank provides a regular supply of water to this residential house. The residential house is west-Facing. The floor of this independent house is beautifully designed using vitrified flooring, giving it an alluring look.

DESCRIPTION: Planning to purchase a plot in trivandrum? This plot in vattappara is situated in one of the excellent locations of the city. It spans over spectacular 5 cents super built up area. Here, a solid foundation can easily withhold construction of 3 floors. To secure the perimeter, a boundary wall is present around the property. The possession of the property can be received within 3 months. The property is owned under freehold contract. The plot is available at a price of  12 lac. The owner is open for negotiation. The residential plot is north-Facing. The plot is close to school and close to market.
